text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Viktor Bozov / Kolmar Group AG <V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com <mailto:V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com> >
Date: Wed, 7 Oct 2020 at 16:09
Subject: RE: prepayment invoice - TIBIEL
To: Veselin Todorov <ves.todorov@gmail.com <mailto:ves.todorov@gmail.com> >
Cc: kristina.lazarov@gmail.com <mailto:kristina.lazarov@gmail.com>  <kristina.lazarov@gmail.com <mailto:kristina.lazarov@gmail.com> >, marmutlieva@gmail.com <mailto:marmutlieva@gmail.com>  <marmutlieva@gmail.com <mailto:marmutlieva@gmail.com> >, vania.milcheva@gmail.com <mailto:vania.milcheva@gmail.com>  <vania.milcheva@gmail.com <mailto:vania.milcheva@gmail.com> >, LNG.ops / Kolmar Group AG <lng.ops@kolmargroup.com <mailto:lng.ops@kolmargroup.com> >, Sergio Halpern / Kolmar Group AG <S.Halpern@kolmargroup.com <mailto:S.Halpern@kolmargroup.com> >, Mirela Domenig / Kolmar Group AG <M.Domenig@kolmargroup.com <mailto:M.Domenig@kolmargroup.com> >, Bram van Eldert / Kolmar Group AG <B.Eldert@kolmargroup.com <mailto:B.Eldert@kolmargroup.com> >




Dear Veselin,

Please find attached the final invoice! I will forward it to our accounting department for payment of Eur 5.60 in your favor. 

 

Regards,

Viktor

 

IMPORTANT NOTE:

 

In view of recent cybercrime attempts, we strongly recommend that the following precautionary measures be observed before processing payments in favour of Kolmar’s entities:

*         All emails initiated by Kolmar’s employees are digitally signed with a worldwide recognized certificate      confirming that the email has been sent by a Kolmar entity. If you do not see this certificate please get in touch with your contact person in Kolmar or contact directly a member of our treasury team at  +41 41 727 01 15/59/08 for verification.

*         Please always use a combination of two different means of communication to verify that new payment details are indeed sent by Kolmar (email, telephone, SMS, WhatsApp etc). Please reach out to your operations contact person in Kolmar or directly to a member of our treasury team for verification in case of receipt of new payment information or in case of any doubt.

*         Kolmar shall not be responsible should your payment be directed to a wrong or fraudulent account.  The obligation to make a valid payment shall remain with the paying party.

 

 

From: Veselin Todorov <ves.todorov@gmail.com <mailto:ves.todorov@gmail.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, 7 October 2020 09:54
To: Viktor Bozov / Kolmar Group AG <V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com <mailto:V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com> >
Cc: kristina.lazarov@gmail.com <mailto:kristina.lazarov@gmail.com> ; marmutlieva@gmail.com <mailto:marmutlieva@gmail.com> ; vania.milcheva@gmail.com <mailto:vania.milcheva@gmail.com> ; LNG.ops / Kolmar Group AG <lng.ops@kolmargroup.com <mailto:lng.ops@kolmargroup.com> >; Sergio Halpern / Kolmar Group AG <S.Halpern@kolmargroup.com <mailto:S.Halpern@kolmargroup.com> >; Mirela Domenig / Kolmar Group AG <M.Domenig@Kolmargroup.com>; Bram van Eldert / Kolmar Group AG <B.Eldert@kolmargroup.com <mailto:B.Eldert@kolmargroup.com> >
Subject: Re: prepayment invoice - TIBIEL

 

Dear Viktor,

 

could you send me the final invoice for September deliveries?

 

Best regards

 

On Wed, 7 Oct 2020 at 10:20, Viktor Bozov / Kolmar Group AG <V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com <mailto:V.Bozov@kolmargroup.com> > wrote:

	Dear Veselin, 

	Please find attached the prepayment invoice for the second period of delivery!

	 

	Viktor Bozov

	On behalf of Kolmar NL

	 

	

	Kolmar NL B.V.

	Claude Debussylaan 10

	1082 MD Amsterdam

	Netherlands

	Tel:     +41 41 727 0125 <tel:+41%2079%20947%2083%2065> 

	Mob:     +41 79 794 65 42 <tel:+41%2079%20947%2083%2065> 

	Fax:      +41 41 727 57 01 <tel:+41%2041%20727%2057%2001> 

	Web: www.kolmargroup.com <http://www.kolmargroup.com/> 

	e-mail: v.bozov@kolmargroup.com <mailto:v.bozov@kolmargroup.com> 

	 

	 

	IMPORTANT NOTE:

	 

	In view of recent cybercrime attempts, we strongly recommend that the following precautionary measures be observed before processing payments in favour of Kolmar’s entities:

	*         All emails initiated by Kolmar’s employees are digitally signed with a worldwide recognized certificate      confirming that the email has been sent by a Kolmar entity. If you do not see this certificate please get in touch with your contact person in Kolmar or contact directly a member of our treasury team at  +41 41 727 01 15/59/08 for verification.

	*         Please always use a combination of two different means of communication to verify that new payment details are indeed sent by Kolmar (email, telephone, SMS, WhatsApp etc). Please reach out to your operations contact person in Kolmar or directly to a member of our treasury team for verification in case of receipt of new payment information or in case of any doubt.

	*         Kolmar shall not be responsible should your payment be directed to a wrong or fraudulent account.  The obligation to make a valid payment shall remain with the paying party.

	 

	 

________________________________

	Please be advised that all e-mail correspondence you receive from Kolmar is furnished with a ‘Digital Signature Certificate’. This security feature complies with the latest industry standards and will give you the assurance that the mail is indeed sent by an employee of Kolmar Group AG or an affiliate. In the event you receive an e-mail without said certificate we strongly advise you to contact your counterpart within Kolmar for additional verification before reacting to it. We trust that you appreciate this additional security measure and would like to thank you again for your ongoing trust and confidence in Kolmar. Yours sincerely, Director Regulatory Compliance

	
________________________________


	This email and any attachments may contain information that is privileged and confidential and is intended only for the use of the individual(s) to which it's addressed. Access to this e-mail or attachment by anyone other than the addressee is unauthorized. If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender and delete the e-mail including any attachments from your system. You must not disclose or distribute any of the contents to any other person. Personal views or opinions are solely those of the author and not of the company. Neither Kolmar Group AG nor its affiliate(s) guarantee that the integrity of this communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of viruses, interceptions or interference. By communicating with anyone at Kolmar Group AG or its affiliates by e-mail, you consent to the monitoring or interception of such email by Kolmar Group AG in accordance with its internal policies. Unless otherwise stated, any pricing information given in this message is indicative only, is subject to change and does not constitute an offer to deal at any price quote. To learn how we may process your personal data, and how you may exercise your rights, please review our Privacy Notice here Privacy Notice <https://www.kolmargroup.com/privacy-policy/> 

	 




 

-- 

Поздрави,

В. Тодоров



-- 

Поздрави,
В. Тодоров
